Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Prostate \Pros"tate\, a. [Gr. ? standing before, fr. ? to set before; ? before + ? to set: cf. F. prostate.] (Anat.) Standing before; -- applied to a gland which is found in the males of most mammals, and is situated at the neck of the bladder where this joins the urethra. -- n. The prostate gland. [1913 Webster]

prostate adj : relating to the prostate gland [syn: {prostatic}] n : a firm partly muscular chestnut sized gland in males at the neck of the urethra; produces a viscid secretion that is the fluid part of semen [syn: {prostate gland}]
